name: Desert Storm Gunner Shooting 3d
description: desert storm gunner shooting is about a lone army commando expert in shooting , us trained hardcore gunner shooter in the city and adept for desert storm combat missions where you have accomplish the army war missions against most brutal and one of the best trained modern army commando equipped with real heavy weapons and attacking waves after waves with tanks , Apache helicopters , stealth drones and f16 f18 jet fighters . O you commando! its not a job of common soldier but this battlefield need a real gunner who's shooting storm should blow up enemies and victory will be upto mark.
